lockScreen.title: BudgetWise
lockScreen.prompt: App is locked. Please enter your password.
lockScreen.error.corrupt: Data is corrupt. Could not unlock.
lockScreen.error.lockedOut: Too many failed attempts. Try again in {seconds}s
confirmation.deleteAlert.title: Delete Alert
confirmation.deleteCustomBudget.title: Delete Custom Budget
confirmation.deleteCustomBudget.message: Are you sure you want to delete this budget, all its transactions, and associated rules?
confirmation.deleteAlert.message: Are you sure you want to delete this spending alert?
confirmation.deletePassword.message: Are you sure you want to remove the password?
confirmation.backup.message: Do you want to create a backup file of all your data?
confirmation.deleteCategory.title: Delete Category
confirmation.deleteCategory.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the category "{category}"? All associated transactions will be moved to 'Uncategorized'. This action cannot be undone.
confirmation.deleteMonthlyBudget.message: Are you sure you want to remove the budget for "{category}"? This will not delete the category or its transactions.
confirmation.deleteBudget.title: Confirm Deletion
confirmation.deleteBudget.message: Are you sure you want to delete this budget? This will also delete all associated transactions and rollover rules. This action cannot be undone.
confirmation.deleteTemplate.title: Confirm Deletion
confirmation.deleteTemplate.message: Are you sure you want to delete this template?
confirmation.deleteRule.title: Confirm Deletion
confirmation.deleteRule.message: Are you sure you want to delete this rollover rule?
confirmation.processRollovers.title: Confirm Rollovers
confirmation.processRollovers.message: This will process all end-of-month rollovers based on current monthly budget surpluses. This action cannot be undone. Proceed?
confirmation.restore.title: Confirm Restore
confirmation.restore.message: Are you sure you want to restore? This will overwrite all current data.
confirmation.deleteTransaction.title: Confirm Deletion
confirmation.deleteTransaction.message: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction?
confirmation.deleteReminder.title: Delete Reminder
confirmation.deleteReminder.message: Are you sure you want to delete this reminder?
header.title: BudgetWise
addTransaction.title: Add Transaction
editTransaction.title: Edit Transaction
addTab.noActiveCustomBudgets: No active custom budgets. Create one in the Budget tab first.
addTab.noCategoriesInBudget: No categories defined for this budget. Add one above.
addTab.validation.newCategory: Please provide a category name and a budget amount for the new category.
addTab.validation.newCustomCategory: Please provide a category name and a budget amount for the new custom category.
addTab.validation.selectCategory: Please select a category for the monthly budget.
addTab.validation.selectCustomBudget: Please select a custom budget and a category within it.
addTab.validation.budgetStatus: Cannot add new transactions to a '{status}' budget. Please set it to 'active' first.
addTab.validation.deadline: The transaction date ({transactionDate}) cannot be after the budget's deadline ({deadlineDate}).
history.title: Transactions
budget.overBudgetWarning: ⚠️ Your budgeted expenses are higher than your income.
budget.limitReached.monthly: Monthly budget limit reached for your plan.
budget.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of this budget purpose
budget.noCategories: No categories added yet. Add categories above to set individual budgets.
budget.limitReached.custom: Custom budget limit reached for your plan.
budget.noBudgetSet: No budget set for this category
settings.title: Settings
settings.setPasswordPrompt: Set a password to lock your app.
settings.noAlerts: You have no active spending alerts.
settings.recurringDescription: Choose how recurring transactions are processed.
settings.subscriptionDescription: You are currently on the {tier} plan.
upgrade.unlockLanguages.title: Unlock 5 Indian Languages
upgrade.unlockLanguages.description: Upgrade to Plus or Premium to use BudgetWise in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, or Malayalam.
reminders.limitReached: Limit reached for your current plan.
analytics.unlockDescription: Upgrade to Plus or Premium to access the Analytics Dashboard and take control of your finances.
analytics.healthScoreTooltip: Your financial wellness score (0-100). It's calculated from your income, expenses, savings, and spending trends to provide a simple summary.
analytics.personality.notEnoughData.insi: Start logging expenses to see your spending habits.
analytics.personality.weekendSpender.ins: You spend {percent}% of your money on weekends.
analytics.personality.weekdayWarrior.ins: You handle most of your spending ({percent}%) during the week.
analytics.personality.balancedSpender.in: Your spending is evenly distributed throughout the week.
analytics.dailyGoalTooltip: Challenge yourself with a daily spending goal! The streak shows how many consecutive days you've stayed under your goal.
analytics.runwayTooltip: Your financial safety net. It's calculated by dividing your total savings by your net spending over the last 30 days. An infinite (∞) runway means you are saving money.
analytics.runwayBasedOn: Based on your current savings and a 30-day net cash flow of
analytics.simulatedSavingsTooltip: A quick way to simulate how changes to your main budgets can affect your monthly savings.
analytics.simulatedSavingsBasedOn: Based on projected income of ₹{income} and a budget of ₹{budget}
analytics.howToReadDescription: This dashboard analyzes your spending over the last {timeframe} days to provide insights into your financial habits and health.
analytics.improveModal.title: How to Improve Your Score
analytics.improveModal.greatJob: Your financial health looks great! Keep up the good work.
analytics.setAlertModal.title: Set Alert for "{category}"
analytics.setAlertModal.description: Get a notification when spending in this category goes above a certain amount this month.
analytics.burnRate.duration: Budget will last ~{days} days at current rate.
analytics.incomeOptimization.title: Income Optimization
analytics.incomeOptimization.description: You need ₹{needed} more income to reach your savings goal of ₹{goal}.
analytics.improveTips.highSpending: Your spending is high compared to your income. Review your largest category, "{category}", to find potential savings.
analytics.improveTips.lowSavings: Your savings rate is low. Try creating a 'Rollover Rule' in the Budget tab to automatically save any monthly surpluses to a savings goal.
analytics.improveTips.increasingSpending: Focus on your '{category}' spending which is up {percent}%.
Check the 'Smart Category Breakdown' for categories with a high upward trend.
analytics.improveTips.shortRunway: Your financial runway is short ({months} months). Focus on building an emergency fund of 3-6 months of expenses.
analytics.setAlertModal.validation.inval: Please enter a valid positive number for the threshold.
toast.passwordSet: Password set successfully. The app will be locked on your next visit.
toast.customBudgetDeleted: Custom budget, its transactions, and associated rules have been deleted.
toast.templateSaveError: Please fill in at least the budget name and amount to save a template.
toast.templateApplied: Template "{name}" applied. You can now create the budget.
toast.selectSourceAndDestination: Please select both a source category and a destination budget.
toast.rolloversProcessed: Rollovers processed for a total of ₹{amount}
transfer.validation.fillAllFields: Please fill in all fields and ensure the transfer amount is valid.
transfer.validation.budgetNotFound: Source or destination budget not found.
transfer.validation.notEnoughFunds: Not enough funds in the source category "{category}". Available: ₹{amount}.
transfer.validation.amountsMustMatch: Total allocated amount (₹{allocated}) must match the transfer amount (₹{transfer}).
toast.noNewRecurringTransactions: No new recurring transactions to process.
toast.reminderUpdated.testMode: Reminder and notification updated successfully! (TEST MODE: fires in 2 mins)
toast.reminderUpdated.notificationError: Reminder updated, but failed to update the notification.
toast.reminderLimitReached: You have reached the maximum number of reminders for your plan. Please upgrade to add more.
toast.reminderAdded.testMode: Bill reminder and notification scheduled successfully! (TEST MODE: fires in 2 mins)
toast.reminderAdded.notificationError: Bill reminder added, but failed to schedule the notification.
toast.reminderAdded.successWeb: Bill reminder added successfully! (Notifications only work on mobile devices)
subscriptions.title: Subscription Plans
subscriptions.cancelAnytime: You can cancel anytime from your {store} subscriptions.
subscriptions.success: Purchase successful! Your plan has been updated.

subscriptions.features.premium.title: Premium
export.title: Export Data
export.validation.bothDatesRequired: Both start and end dates are required
export.validation.startBeforeEnd: Start date must be before end date
export.note1: • JSON includes complete data with budgets and categories
export.note2: • CSV is optimized for spreadsheet applications
export.note3: • Date range limited to 90 days maximum
transfer.title: Transfer Funds
reminders.unlockDescription: Upgrade to Plus or Premium to set bill reminders and get notified before your due dates.
toast.restoreError: Error restoring data: {message}. Please ensure you are using a valid backup file.
toast.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please select a .json backup file.
toast.excelExportError: An error occurred while exporting to Excel: {message}
toast.pdfGenerationError: An error occurred while generating the PDF report: {message}
